summary: Updating the reference to the i686-linux bootstrap-tools, so it takes the newest I uploaded yesterday. These have gcc 4.5.1, that fulfills the glibc 2.12.1 requirement of having a compiler equal or greater to gcc 4.4 to build proper x86 32-bit code (http://sourceware.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=12123)
